info.name: Bubble Universe [Doctor Who Dashboard Theme]
info.description: A classic black and white dashboard featuring Matt Smith and Karen Gillan
info.additionalInfo:
Coding and graphics by http://mocking-turtle.tumblr.com

**I know there's still stuff that's messed up and I'm trying to fix all of them. If you see anything please drop me a message on my Tumblr so I can fix it! c:

Also the quality isn't as terrible as the screenshot image makes it out to be

UPDATE 4/25/13: it was brought to my attention that the image link was broken, so I replaced the image with something similar (but not exactly the same, as I didn't have the original saved)
